meaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>neck</radical> and the kanji <kanji>neck</kanji> are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: The only thing you do with your <kanji>neck</kanji> is use it to swallow lots of <reading>coo</reading>l <reading>bea</reading>ns (くび). Mm mm. Feel those cool, cool beans sliding down your neck. You don't really taste them, but you know they're there.
